imgDesc.text:
As a form of Khvarena scattered upon the earth, Farrwicks contain that same power and will stick to <color=#ffe14b>your characters</color> once <color=#ffe14b>picked up</color> and affect nearby Gray Crystals.
You can also <color=#ffe14b>put</color> a Farrwick down where you need it to unleash its power.
